best_answers.q1: School B surveys student information individually before providing guidance services to meet students' needs.
best_answers.q2: Providing scholarships to students. in need of financial support.
best_answers.q3: “You regret it because made your friend sad; let’s see how we can figure out this problem better.”
best_answers.q4: "I have an appointment with another student today. Would it be convenient for you to see me tomorrow after school?"
best_answers.q6: “I’m concerned about you, could you tell me what is happening so we can find ways to figure it out.”
best_answers.q7: Teacher A explains her confidentiality limitation to the students who receive online counseling.
best_answers.q8: To emphasize preventing and encouraging emotional and social learning, including resilience in students and teachers.
best_answers.q9: Mental health untreated -> mind fragility -> problems coping
best_answers.q10: Emotional surveys through deep and understanding listening.
